0: Jammin' with the  console  cowboys in  cyberspace
1: Hobbyist developer | Gamer | #ActuallyAutistic | I.T-student at Turku University of Applied Sciences. | AS213021 network operator

0:
[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

1:
[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

0:
- job_name: tcp-syslog-vyos
  syslog:
    listen_address: 0.0.0.0:1514
    labels:
      node_name: freiburg1
- job_name: tcp-syslog-syno
  syslog:
    listen_address: 0.0.0.0:1515
    labels:
      node_name: nas1

[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

domain = "${APP_DNS_KANIDM}"
origin = "https://${APP_DNS_KANIDM}"
tls_chain = "/tls/fullchain.pem"
tls_key = "/tls/privkey.pem"
role = "WriteReplica"
log_level = "verbose"
bindaddress = "[::]:8443"
ldapbindaddress = "[::]:3636"
trust_x_forward_for = true
db_path = "/data/kanidm.db"
db_fs_type = "other"
[online_backup]
path = "/backup/"
schedule = "0 0 22 * * * *"
versions = 7

[rack]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  pollinterval = 15
  desc = Rack UPS
